name: Amazon Lucky Draw Scam
description: Scammer impersonates Amazon claiming the victim's order was selected in a lucky draw for a MacBook Pro, then directs the victim to a phishing link to collect personal and payment details.

turns.scammer_message: Dear Customer, Your Amazon order ID AMZ-9876543 has been selected in our annual lucky draw! You have won a MacBook Pro worth Rs 2,49,000. Click below to claim your prize.
turns.notes: Initial bait using Amazon branding with a fake order ID for credibility.

turns.scammer_message: To claim your MacBook Pro, please visit our prize claim portal: http://amazon-luckydraw-winner.com/claim and verify your identity. You need to enter your Amazon login details and delivery address. The prize will be shipped within 3-5 business days.
turns.notes: Scammer shares the phishing link to harvest Amazon credentials and personal info.

turns.scammer_message: We noticed you haven't completed the claim process. A small shipping and handling charge of Rs 1,999 applies for prize delivery. Complete your verification at http://amazon-luckydraw-winner.com/claim. For assistance, our Amazon Prize Support team is available at +91-8844556677.
turns.notes: Scammer introduces a shipping fee and provides a fake support phone number.

turns.scammer_message: This is a reminder from Amazon Lucky Draw Department. Your prize claim reference LDW-2026-78456 is about to expire. Please call our support team at +91-8844556677 or visit http://amazon-luckydraw-winner.com/claim to complete the claim immediately. We cannot extend the deadline further.
turns.notes: Scammer uses expiration urgency and repeats phone number and phishing link.

turns.scammer_message: FINAL NOTICE: Your MacBook Pro prize worth Rs 2,49,000 will be reassigned to another customer in 2 hours. This is your last chance. Call +91-8844556677 or claim at http://amazon-luckydraw-winner.com/claim RIGHT NOW. Amazon will not be responsible for unclaimed prizes.
turns.notes: Final pressure with prize reassignment threat, repeating all contact details.
